document.full_text: pope benedict took questions from a child in japan, a muslim woman in ivory coast and a mother caring for a son in a permanent coma in his first televised dialogue with the public, broadcast on good friday.
document.title: pope talks to public in rare tv broadcast
lines_and_colors: pope benedict took questions from a child in japan, a muslim woman in ivory coast and a mother caring for a son in a permanent coma in his first televised dialogue with the public, broadcast on good friday.
